text.data:
Sendak: I want you to listen to what I have to say...
Listen I don't wanna listen.[end1]

I have been thinking. I too feel the struggle of the Holy Dragon within the princess... Being the only other one who can feel it, I wish to console her...
But how should I sympathize with a girl at her age?[end]
Sendak: I am sorry, [character][0x0]. I suppose I shall have to tell you later after all.[end]
Sendak: My long ramblings are boring, are they not?[end]

Zora's Son: Uh... um.. I...
I'm a lancer. Cleaning is my specialty. Thanks a lot![end]
AH![end]
Nnnggg... Just three more minutes...[end]
Let him sleep Hit him Wake him up gently[end1]
Nnnggg... Thanks Mom...[end]
Nnnggg... Just five more minutes...[end]
Who are you?! You wake me up just like my mom![end]
Eh?! You're the captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad... Which means... my mom is with you too![end]
Oh no!![end]
Zora: Hey! There you are![end]
Zora: [character][0x0]. This boy is my son. He left me and came to this kingdom.[end]
Zora: He left me because... Hey, you tell him yourself![end]
O-okay! I wanted to start a dragon squad in Campbell that would be even better than Kahna's. So then I left my mom and came to Campbell to start on it.[end]
Zora: And? Who's in this dragon squad of yours?[end]
Uh... umm... Me, and one dragon...[end]
Zora: That's all?! How miserable. Well, I had expected as much.[end]
Zora: That's a strange dragon. Try calling it.[end]
Uh... um...[end]
Come! [0x28]Please come. Please![0x29][end]
Zora: Even dragons mock you... How miserable.[end]
Zora: [character][0x0]. You try.[end]
Come! Wait![end1]
Zora: What will making it wait do? Come on, [character][0x0].[end]
Whoa!! I can't believe dragons listen to what you say! You really are the captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad![end]
Zora: Hmm. So there are dragons like this too.[end]
Zora: What do you think, [character][0x0]. Will you let my son and this dragon ride on your ship? I welcome them. Only the dragon.[end1]
Don't say something like that![end]

You can have my son clean the hallways if you'd like.
He can't do much of anything, so he can learn by observation.[end]
Thanks, [character][0x0].[end]
I'll tell him all about the rules on [character][0x9].[end]
Okay, you! Come here![end]
Battlefield Salesman: Thank you for all your help. I'm stocking up on new things, so come see me again![end]
Oh! [character][0x0]! Welcome to my home! It's me, the battlefield salesman![end]
Are you [character][0x0]? Glad to meet you. I hear you're always helping out people I know...[end]
I get the feeling they don't know what good taste is.[end]
Hee hee. He believes me. Hee hee.[end]
Give this dragon a name.[end]
Zora's Son: I see! Giving dragons a name! I never thought about that![end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x0]! This old man said if I gave him some money he'd give me back 1000 times as much![end]

Bikkebakke: What should I do...
Try giving him some. He's lying to you.[end1]
If you think so, it must be okay![end]
I guess so after all...[end]
Okay! I'll give him my wallet!![end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x0]... If what the old man says is true, what should I do?[end]
There's a letter lying here...[end]
Read it Don't bother with it[end1]

Hello, battlefield salesman. You're always on one journey to the next.
I wish you'd stop by my store when you come back to visit. I want to see you. But no alcohol. I'm lonely... I miss you.[end]
Take it Don't bother with it[end1]
You got a Letter.[end]
They're a little expensive...[end]
Zora: [character][0x0]! I have something to tell you![end]

A bunch of men in armor came in and asked for a room...
I thought they came here to get revenge on the Granbelos Empire?[end]
Matelite: Hero of the liberation of Campbell! How about some of my autographed weapons and armor? You buy some too, [character][0x0]![end]
Barclay: This is pathetic...[end]
Taicho: You help out too, [character][0x0]![end]

Do you know of the Campbell Dragon Squad?
Yes No[end1]
Oh! How rare![end]
Oh, I see.[end]
You should meet the captain. He's on the 2nd floor. He's a very pathetic excuse of a person. He's never even been deemed an enemy by the Empire![end]
You got a Porno Mag.[end]
You got a Handmade Cookie.[end]
You got a Heal SP.[end]
You got a Drawer Thing.[end]
You got a Difficult Book.[end]
You got a Prodigy Notebook.[end]
You got a Sweet Memory.[end]
You got some Sweet Wine.[end]
Battlefield Salesman: [character][0x0]... I'll give you some Sweet Wine for free.[end][end]
